title: Credentials
name: Credential Name
optionalWhenEditing: Optional when editing - leave blank to keep current

placeholders.name: Enter credential name
placeholders.passwordOptional: Leave blank to keep current password
placeholders.tokenOptional: Leave blank to keep current token

placeholders.publicKeyOptional: Leave blank to keep current public key

createHelpText: Configure secure Git repository access credentials for automated operations.
editHelpText: Modify your Git access credentials and security settings.
securityNotice: Credentials are encrypted and stored securely.

messages.noCredentialsDesc: You haven't created any credentials yet. Create your first credential to get started.
messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
